output.sentences: This is the view from the apartment where I am staying.
I went for a walk there earlier and I noticed this sweet kitty following me around.
We walked for a while together before this dog came along and scared the little kitty off.
She ran into this hedge, and I looked for her, but all to no avail.
When I arrived back at the apartment I told the manager about the cat. Hopefully we will see her and help,
